node.html: Julius is a certified project manager with a BS in computer science. Julius has maintained the organization and work flow of team Penny Bank since inception. He works with the team as a whole and also each individual to problem solve through issues keeping team Penny Bank on the same page.

Ryan is a software engineer who graduated from George Mason University. He primarily contributes to back end and network development. Ryan helps maintain the health of Penny Bank's servers and he also designed Penny Bank's version 1 logo!

Alumni of Virginia Tech, Darryl wears multiple hats on the Penny Bank team. Darryl consults and helps design campaigns for the product development team. He plays a role in optimizing graphics for the development team and consultation on Penny Bank's application archetecture.

Ramon is a software engineer who studied at UNCC Charlotte. He is a full stack developer that designed the concept and system of Penny Bank. He has contributed front-end development to Penny Bank's mobile app and website. He also has contributed to the API and database architecture behind Penny Bank.
